title: ATTENDANCE
text: Maintains regular attendance with prior notification of absence. Consistently punctual.

title: APPEARANCE
text: Dresses appropriately. Is neat and clean. Hair is clean and neatly styled.

title: PROFESSIONALISM
text: Conducts self appropriately. Is dependable, responsible, shows initiative and acts honestly. Interacts appropriately with supervisor and co-workers.

title: QUALITY
text: Meets quality standards of work. Takes pride in their work product.
